alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 5:34PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of De Kalb, Van Buren, Warren, Coffee, northern Grundy, White, central Putnam and eastern Cannon Counties through 615 PM CST... At 533 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Smithville to near Manchester. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, McMinnville, Manchester, Sparta, Smithville, Spencer, Tullahoma, Gruetli-Laager, Baxter, Altamont, Burgess Falls State Park, Rock Island State Park and Summitville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 270 and 299. Interstate 24 between mile markers 106 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
